title: Sand Shark
summaries: Sand Sharks are Hardmode enemies only found in Desert biomes during a Sandstorm. They are able to "swim" through all varieties of Sand, Hardened Sand, and Sandstone Blocks, but will collide normally against any other block. When they draw near a player, they will lunge out of the sand to attack.
The Sand Shark itself only appears in ordinary Deserts. There are other variants for different versions of the Desert:

• Bone Biter in the Corrupted Desert
  • Flesh Reaver in the Crimson Desert
  • Crystal Thresher in the Hallowed Desert
